application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Silver Birch (applicants ref. 1) - Reduce the density by lightly thinning approximately 15% including the removal of deadwood, lifting of low branches and the necessary shaping of the trees, ensuring the height and basic shape is retained.1 x Silver Birch (applicants ref. 2) - Reduce the density by lightly thinning approximately 15% including the removal of deadwood, lifting of low branches, and the necessary shaping of the trees, ensuring the height and basic shape is retained.1 x Cherry (applicants ref. 3) - Reduce the density by lightly thinning approximately 20% including the removal of deadwood, lifting of low branches, and the necessary shaping of the trees, ensuring the height and basic shape is retained.1 x Crab Apple (applicants ref. 4) - Reduce the density by lightly thinning approximately 20% including the removal of deadwood, lifting of low branches, and the necessary shaping of the trees, ensuring the height and basic shape is retained.1 x Mulberry (applicants ref. 5) - Reduce the density by lightly thinning approximately 20% including the removal of deadwood, lifting of low branches, and the necessary shaping of the trees, ensuring the height and basic shape is retained.
